title: How to Make Ajowan Dressing

steps.headline: Place the spices, mint and tamarind or lemon water into the mixing bowl.
Cover the mixing bowl with a lid or foil and leave to stand for 1 hour.
Season the dish to taste with salt.
Pour into a serving container or store in a clean bottle.
steps.description: The mixture can be kept in the fridge for up to a week. This goes well on salads that improve with a spicy, hot touch.

text: Place the spices, mint and tamarind or lemon water into the mixing bowl. Mix together thoroughly. Cover the mixing bowl with a lid or foil and leave to stand for 1 hour.  Season the dish to taste with salt.  Pour into a serving container or store in a clean bottle. The mixture can be kept in the fridge for up to a week. This goes well on salads that improve with a spicy, hot touch.
